00048 #ifndef _MT481C2M32B2TG_H_
00049 #define _MT481C2M32B2TG_H_
00050 
00051 
00052 /*
00053 These values are device specific. Consult the datasheet for
00054 the given device for more information
00055 */
00056 
00060 // number of cols = 256  ->  8 col bits
00061 #define SDRAM_COL_BITS  9
00062 
00066 // number of rows = 2048 -> 11 row bits
00067 #define SDRAM_ROW_BITS  13
00068 
00072 // number of banks = 4   ->  2 bank bits
00073 #define SDRAM_BANK_BITS 2
00074 
00075 
00079 // Refresh rate
00080 // Use 15.6 uS = 15600 ns.
00081 // With cpu hz 20 MHz = 50 ns clock cycle :
00082 // Refresh rate = 15600 ns / 50 ns = 312 clock cycles
00083 // Generic formula for chip (156 * (CPU_HZ / 1000) ) / 10000
00084 #define SDRAM_TR 312
00085 
00086 
00090 // CAS Latency: 3
00091 // Should be 3 for Speed grade -5 part (up to 200Mhz)
00092 #define SDRAM_CAS 3
00093 
00097 // Min: 2ck
00098 #define SDRAM_TWR 2
00099 
00104 // Min 55 ns -> 55 / 50 ~=  2
00105 #define SDRAM_TRC 7
00106 
00110 // 15 ns -> 15 / 50 ~= 1
00111 #define SDRAM_TRP 2
00112 
00115 //15 ns -> 15 / 50 ~= 1
00116 #define SDRAM_TRCD 2
00117 
00121 // 42 ns -> 42 / 50 ~= 1
00122 #define SDRAM_TRAS 5
00123 
00127 // 55 ns -> 55 / 50 ~= 2
00128 #define SDRAM_TXSR 5
00129 
00131 #define SDRAM_INIT_AUTO_REFRESH_COUNT 8
00132 
00136 #define SDRAM_TRFC                      66
00137 
00141 #define SDRAM_TMRD                      2
00142 
00145 #define SDRAM_STABLE_CLOCK_INIT_DELAY   100
00146 
00147 #endif
